channel.title: Engineering on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Engineering on Greg Herlein

item.title: Foundations of High-Performance Engineering Teams
item.description: The US Navy gave me a solid foundation in leadership and operational excellence. But translating that into the business world requires a few more things.

item.title: DevOps: Manage the Cognitive Load
item.description: Speed, cost and quality are considered the vectors that you can control. If you are moving to cloud to get the “ilities” that comprise quality, you need to seriously consider Cognitive Load.
